revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}'''Doomseeker''' is server browser for client/server [[source port]]s, available for Windows, Linux and MacOS X. It supports [[Zandronum]], [[Odamex]], and [[Chocolate Doom]], as well as {{dw|Sonic Robo Blast 2}} and Turok 2 Remaster, through individual plugins.
==External links== * [http://doomseeker.drdteam.org/ Official homepage] * [https://bitbucket.org/Doomseeker/doomseeker Mercurial repository] * [http://devbuilds.drdteam.org/doomseeker/ HG builds] hosted by DRD Team
[[Category:Tools]]
